synopsis.text: In a bizarre twist of fate, Amagane Rinne, a cheerful high school student, finds herself navigating the peculiar hallways of a school in the afterlife following an unfortunate accident. Trapped in the underworld, she is surrounded by an eccentric mix of demonic classmates and monstrous teachers. As she grapples with her new reality and yearns for her old life, Rinne forms unexpected bonds with her otherworldly peers. Can she find a way back to the world of the living, or is she destined to spend her days in this hellish high school? Join Rinne on her extraordinary journey as she learns the true meaning of friendship and perseverance in the face of adversity.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
